attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I couldn’t even walk my alligator to the tea party down the street. Worst app ever take it off the App Store.

attributes.title: i don’t understand what the hype is
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app in order to stay informed on what our president stood for and how he helps our wonderful country. to my surprise this app led me to realize that our president is not only racist, but is also a homophobic, misogynistic, xenophobic, islamophobic man who deserves no right to have his app displayed on the app store. so i deleted the app. then i was somehow recruited through the use of Jehovah Witnesses knocking at my front door demanding that i redownload the app and support our president. this was uncalled for. in conclusion, no ❤️.

attributes.title: EW NO ❤️
attributes.review: okay so i downloaded the app to see what this president has in store for us but it kept making my phone glitch and it deleted all my photos and my whole camera roll was a orange man and it wouldn’t let me delete them so I just deleted the app but then later that day I got a vision that was like download the app and it kept threatening me so I did and then my phones screen broke THIS APO IS JUST EW 👁👅👁🖕🏻 STAY AWAY FROM IT 😣 my mistake  and now im using my mom phone and her facebook friends keep talking anyway 🧚🏻‍♂️✨TRUMP 2020✨ 🧚🏻‍♂️ IN JAIL 🧚🏻‍♂️✨ DADDY ANONYMOUS 2020 ✨✨✨✨✨✨

attributes.title: Satire
attributes.review: I have always considered Donald Trump to be an extremely pretentious, ostentatious man, and not in a good way. His campaign is to literally brainwash people. If you support him, then you also support racism, sexism, facism, homophobia, xenophobia, sexual assault, and ignorance.

attributes.title: Tried to download...said I had a “chinese virus”
attributes.review: I downloaded this app really just to try and get a better understanding of what’s going on and current events(since this is the #1 news app ofc) but I just got a screen saying I had a chinese virus and couldn’t download. Then the app said it was going to building a firewall in my phone... very dissatisfied customer and will be deleting forever

attributes.title: doesn’t work
attributes.review: Kept glitching and just isn’t important to anyone but for people who care for pedos also just was trash 🤮🤮❤️

attributes.title: App crashes
attributes.review: App crashes a soon as I open it. Poor app design.

attributes.title: I hate this.
attributes.review: This app is udderly stupid.donald trump is a racist,sexist homophobic orange dude that tried to make me vote for him so I am disgusted bye u Donald.

attributes.title: 🧚🏻💫✨ T R A S H ✨💫🧚🏻
attributes.review: ✨💫🧚🏻💫🧚🏻🧚🏻💖I’d seriously rather go back to eating tide pods than have this app on my phone 💖🧚🏻🧚🏻💫🧚🏻💫✨

attributes.title: Wow so bad!
attributes.review: Its almost like they hired someone who didn't know what they were doing to do a job they weren’t qualified for. Weird how that leads to a load of bull.
